00024 L_initializer::L_initializer ()
00025 {
00026     iQBiPB = new double[MATRIX_SIZE];
00027     iQAT = new double[MATRIX_SIZE];
00028     AiQATiQBiPB = new double[MATRIX_SIZE];
00029 }

00032 L_initializer::~L_initializer()
00033 {
00034     if (iQBiPB != NULL)
00035         delete iQBiPB;
00036     if (iQAT != NULL)
00037         delete iQAT;
00038     if (AiQATiQBiPB != NULL)
00039         delete AiQATiQBiPB;
00040 }

00053 void L_initializer::chol_dec (double *mx9)
00054 {
00055     // 1st line
00056     mx9[0] = sqrt (mx9[0]);
00057 
00058     // 2nd line
00059     mx9[1] /= mx9[0];
00060     mx9[4] = sqrt(mx9[4] - mx9[1]*mx9[1]); 
00061 
00062     // 3rd line
00063     mx9[2] /= mx9[0]; 
00064     mx9[5] = (mx9[5] - mx9[2]*mx9[1])/mx9[4];
00065     mx9[8] = sqrt(mx9[8] - mx9[5]*mx9[5] - mx9[2]*mx9[2]);
00066 
00067     // These elements must be 0. (but they are never used)
00068 //    mx9[3] = mx9[6] = mx9[7] = 0;
00069 }

00072 
00083 void L_initializer::form_iQBiPB (const double *B, const double *i2Q, const double i2P)
00084 {
00085     // diagonal elements
00086     iQBiPB[0] = i2P * B[0]*B[0] + i2Q[0];
00087     iQBiPB[4] = i2P * B[1]*B[1] + i2Q[1];
00088     iQBiPB[8] = i2P * B[2]*B[2] + i2Q[2];
00089 
00090     // symmetric elements (no need to initialize all of them)
00091     iQBiPB[1] = /*iQBiPB[3] =*/ i2P * B[0]*B[1];
00092     iQBiPB[2] = /*iQBiPB[6] =*/ i2P * B[0]*B[2];
00093     iQBiPB[5] = /*iQBiPB[7] =*/ i2P * B[1]*B[2];
00094 }

00097 
00106 void L_initializer::form_iQAT (const double T, const double A6, const double *i2Q)
00107 {
00108     iQAT[0] = i2Q[0];
00109     iQAT[1] = T * i2Q[1];
00110     iQAT[2] = A6 * i2Q[2];
00111     iQAT[4] = i2Q[1];
00112     iQAT[5] = T * i2Q[2];
00113     iQAT[8] = i2Q[2];
00114 }
00115 
00116 
00126 void L_initializer::form_AiQATiQBiPB (const double T, const double A6)
00127 {
00128     // 1st column
00129     AiQATiQBiPB[0] = iQBiPB[0] + iQAT[0] + T*iQAT[1] + A6*iQAT[2];
00130     AiQATiQBiPB[1] = iQBiPB[1] +             iQAT[1] +  T*iQAT[2];
00131     AiQATiQBiPB[2] = iQBiPB[2] +                          iQAT[2];
00132 
00133     // 2nd column
00134     // symmetric elements are not initialized
00135 //    AiQATiQBiPB[3] = iQBiPB[3] + T*iQAT[4] + A6*iQAT[5];
00136     AiQATiQBiPB[4] = iQBiPB[4] +   iQAT[4] +  T*iQAT[5];
00137     AiQATiQBiPB[5] = iQBiPB[5] +                iQAT[5];
00138 
00139     // 3rd column
00140 //    AiQATiQBiPB[6] = iQBiPB[6] + A6*iQAT[8];
00141 //    AiQATiQBiPB[7] = iQBiPB[7] +  T*iQAT[8];
00142     AiQATiQBiPB[8] = iQBiPB[8] +    iQAT[8];
00143 }

00146 
00154 void L_initializer::form_L_non_diag(const double *ecLp, double *ecLc)
00155 {
00156     /* L(k+1,k) * L(k,k)' = - inv(Q) * A'
00157      *
00158      * xxx      xxx     xxx
00159      *  xx  *    xx =    xx
00160      *   x        x       x
00161      *
00162      * all matrices are upper triangular
00163      */
00164 
00165     // main diagonal
00166     ecLc[0] = -iQAT[0] / ecLp[0];
00167     ecLc[4] = -iQAT[4] / ecLp[4];
00168     ecLc[8] = -iQAT[8] / ecLp[8];
00169 
00170     // sub-diagonal 1
00171     ecLc[3] = (-iQAT[1] - ecLc[0]*ecLp[1]) / ecLp[4];
00172     ecLc[7] = (-iQAT[5] - ecLc[4]*ecLp[5]) / ecLp[8];
00173 
00174     // sub-diagonal 2
00175     ecLc[6] = (-iQAT[2] - ecLc[0]*ecLp[2] - ecLc[3]*ecLp[5]) / ecLp[8];
00176 }
00177 
00178 
00179 
00190 void L_initializer::form_L_diag(const double *ecLp, double *ecLc)
00191 {
00192     // the first matrix L(0,0) is computed differently
00193     if (ecLp == NULL)
00194     {
00195         //0.5*inv(Q) + 0.5*B*inv(P)*B'
00196         // matrix is symmetric (no need to initialize all elements)
00197         ecLc[0] = iQBiPB[0];
00198         ecLc[1] = iQBiPB[1];
00199         ecLc[2] = iQBiPB[2];
00200         ecLc[4] = iQBiPB[4];
00201         ecLc[5] = iQBiPB[5];
00202         ecLc[8] = iQBiPB[8];
00203     }
00204     else
00205     {
00206     // L(k+1,k+1) = (- L(k+1,k) * L(k+1,k)') + (A * inv(Q) * A' + inv(Q) + B * inv(P) * B)
00207         // diagonal elements
00208         ecLc[0] = -(ecLp[0]*ecLp[0] + ecLp[3]*ecLp[3] + ecLp[6]*ecLp[6]) + AiQATiQBiPB[0];
00209         ecLc[4] = -(ecLp[4]*ecLp[4] + ecLp[7]*ecLp[7]) + AiQATiQBiPB[4];
00210         ecLc[8] = -(ecLp[8]*ecLp[8]) + AiQATiQBiPB[8];
00211         // symmetric nondiagonal elements (no need to initialize all of them)
00212         ecLc[1] = /*ecLc[3] =*/ -(ecLp[3]*ecLp[4] + ecLp[6]*ecLp[7]) + AiQATiQBiPB[1];
00213         ecLc[2] = /*ecLc[6] =*/ -ecLp[6]*ecLp[8] + AiQATiQBiPB[2];
00214         ecLc[5] = /*ecLc[7] =*/ -ecLp[7]*ecLp[8] + AiQATiQBiPB[5];
00215     }
00216 
00217     // chol (L(k+1,k+1))
00218     chol_dec (ecLc);
00219 }

00222 
00230 void L_initializer::form_L(const chol_solve_param& csp, const int N, double *ecL)
00231 {
00232     int i;
00233     int cur_offset;
00234     int prev_offset;
00235 
00236     double T = csp.T[0];
00237     double T2 = T*T/2;
00238     double B[3] = {T2*T/3 - csp.h[0]*T, T2, T};
00239 
00240     // form all matrices
00241     form_iQBiPB (B, csp.i2Q, csp.i2P);
00242 #ifndef QPAS_VARIABLE_T_h
00243     double A6 = T2;
00244     form_iQAT (T, A6, csp.i2Q);
00245     form_AiQATiQBiPB (T, A6);
00246 #endif
00247 
00248 
00249     // the first matrix on diagonal
00250     form_L_diag(NULL, ecL);
00251 
00252     // offsets
00253     cur_offset = MATRIX_SIZE;
00254     prev_offset = 0;
00255     for (i = 1; i < N; i++)
00256     {
00257 #ifdef QPAS_VARIABLE_T_h
00258         T = csp.T[i];
00259         T2 = T*T/2;
00260         B[0] = T2*T/3 - csp.h[i]*T;
00261         B[1] = T2;
00262         B[2] = T;
00263         double A6 = T2 - csp.dh[i-1];
00264 
00265         // form all matrices
00266         form_iQBiPB (B, csp.i2Q, csp.i2P);
00267         form_iQAT (T, A6, csp.i2Q);
00268         form_AiQATiQBiPB (T, A6);
00269 #endif
00270 
00271         // form (b), (d), (f) ... 
00272         form_L_non_diag(&ecL[prev_offset], &ecL[cur_offset]);
00273         // update offsets
00274         cur_offset += MATRIX_SIZE;
00275         prev_offset += MATRIX_SIZE;
00276 
00277         // form (c), (e), (g) ...
00278         form_L_diag(&ecL[prev_offset], &ecL[cur_offset]);
00279         // update offsets
00280         cur_offset += MATRIX_SIZE;
00281         prev_offset += MATRIX_SIZE;
00282     }
00283 }
